item.title: Getting started with requirejs
item.description: Hello World with Nested Dependencies # The following example expands upon Hello World by demonstrating multiple dependencies using the define() function. Create a new HTML file called index.html and paste the following content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>Hello RequireJS</title> <script type="text/javascript" src="http://requirejs.org/docs/release/2.3.2/minified/require.js"></script> </head> <body> <!-- place content here ---> <script> requirejs(["scripts/say"], function(say) { console.log(say.hello("english")); console.log(say.hello("spanish")); console.log(say.hello("french")); }); </script> </body> Create a new JS file at scripts/say.js and paste the following content:
